channel.title: Hold your breath
channel.description:
This series focuses on air pollution and its impact on America.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Air pollution control in the community, part two
item.description: This program focuses on air pollution control from a community perspective.
item.dc:creator: Ford, Patrick
item.dc:subject: Science & Technology

item.title: Air pollution and the industries, part one
item.description: This program focuses on how industries deal with air pollution.
item.dc:creator: Ford, Patrick
item.dc:subject: Science & Technology

item.title: The economic cost of pollution
item.description: This program focuses on the financial costs of air pollution.
item.dc:creator: Ford, Patrick
item.dc:subject: Science & Technology

item.title: Air pollution and the industries, part two
item.description: This program continues to focus on how industries deal with air pollution.
item.dc:creator: Ford, Patrick
item.dc:subject: Science & Technology

item.title: The private citizen in the fight for clean air
item.description: This program focuses on the impact that private citizens can have when they battle air pollution.
item.dc:creator: Ford, Patrick
item.dc:subject: Science & Technology

item.title: Air pollution and the industries, part three
item.description: This program focuses on how coal and chemical industries deal with air pollution.
item.dc:creator: Ford, Patrick
item.dc:subject: Science & Technology

item.title: Agricultural problems caused by air pollution
item.description: This program focuses on the financial costs of air pollution, particularly as it relates to agriculture.
item.dc:creator: Ford, Patrick
item.dc:subject: Science & Technology

item.title: Air pollution and cancer
item.description: This program focuses on air pollution role in causing cancer.
item.dc:creator: Ford, Patrick
item.dc:subject: Science & Technology

item.title: Air pollution control in the community, part one
item.description: This program focuses on air pollution control from a community perspective.
item.dc:creator: Ford, Patrick
item.dc:subject: Science & Technology

item.title: Tomorrow's air
item.description: This program focuses on the quality of air in the future.
item.dc:creator: Ford, Patrick
item.dc:subject: Science & Technology

item.title: Acute episodes
item.description: This program focuses on episodes when poor air quality became a crisis.
item.dc:creator: Ford, Patrick
item.dc:subject: Science & Technology

item.title: Day to day health effects
item.description: This program focuses on the general health effects of air pollution.
item.dc:creator: Ford, Patrick
item.dc:subject: Science & Technology

item.title: Pollution in your backyard
item.description: This program seeks to personalize the impact of air pollution by focusing on a woman who has been fighting air pollution in Chicago for twenty years.
item.dc:creator: Ford, Patrick
item.dc:subject: Science & Technology
